{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ilex Forest |image = [[File:Ilex Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ilex Forest. |tokens = 4,000 |location = On route 34. }} '''Ilex Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 82,200 |- | Noctowl (Boss) || 300,000 |- | Beedrill (Boss) || 300,000 |- | Butterfree (Boss) || 300,000 |- | Celebi (Boss) || 600,000 |} ==Pokémon== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !! Boss |- | [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie || rowspan=8|[[File:Noctowl.png|40px]] Noctowl
